name: Ningbo Old City NFT
description:
The year is 2036, Ningbo, China…

Not much has changed.  

Ningbo was known as a trade city on the Silk Road at least two thousand years ago.
 
As a city with rich culture and a long history dating back to Jingtou Mountain Culture in 6300 BC and the Hemundu culture in 4800 BC, Ningbo was awarded "City of Culture in East Asia" by the governments of China, of Japan, and of Korea in 2016.  

The first character in the city's name ning (宁 or 寧) means "serene", while its second character bo (波) translates to "wave".   

What has changed?  

Crypto Aliens - launched on November 19th, 2021 - traversed and time-traveled to earth via the blockchain.    The famed combination of Crypto Alien Babes (CAB) and their epic human partners have saved the world from the ‘dark ones’.  

The CAB anime animation series is now celebrating its 1000th episode.  The CAB NFT community is world-renowned for its charity work and selfless acts.    

Transparency is the key currency.  

  People no longer have to second guess governments.  Banking is no longer ‘hide-and-go-seek'. Everything is out in the open.  

It’s almost impossible to take ‘bribes’ anymore.  No more middle-man.   The world is DAO run.  

The Grow Group, IDO platform ‘Equinox’, CAB and our very own ‘Starseed’ brand -  thanks to their incredible communities - have exposed the bad actors in the crypto industry. The industry is now humming along with excitement.  

Back in 2021, NFT’s were a simple way for anyone to enter ‘crypto’. They helped to bring ‘crypto’ to the universe.  Provably authentic. Transparent provenance. Secure yet globally and instantly accessible. Royalty monetization for creatives, enhanced liquidity are just some of the benefits of NFT’s.  

Thank you once again for being part of the change.    

Long live CAB, NOX, GROW, EQUINOX and their awesome communities.    

Love


Starseed
